title: Amexio Dialogue
description: A Simple dialogue which renders various prompts like Confirmation/Alert based on type, title, body user has configured.

gridData.name: footer-align
gridData.description: Alignment of footer contents to right or left.

gridData.name: button-type
gridData.description: show the type of button

gridData.name: button-size
gridData.description: Different Sizes of Buttons availabe : large, default, small & xsmall

gridData.name: close-on-escape
gridData.description: Dialogue box closes on click of Escape Key.

gridData.name: show
gridData.description: uses two way binding to Show / Hide Dialogue.

gridData.name: material-design
gridData.description: user doesn't want header background color then user can use  material-design is equal to true

gridData.name: show-dialogue
gridData.description: Show / Hide Dialogue.

gridData.name: closable
gridData.description: User can close the Dialogue.

gridData.name: title
gridData.description: Title for dialog.

gridData.name: message
gridData.description: Alert or confirm message

gridData.name: custom
gridData.description: User can custom dialogue box.

gridData.name: type
gridData.description: Confirm and Alert are two alert type of dialogue, by using (ALERT/CONFIRM) user give (alert/confirm) message.

gridData.name: primary-action-label
gridData.description: Label to be displayed for primary action.

gridData.name: secondary-action-label
gridData.description: Label to be displayed for secondary action.

gridData.name: message-type
gridData.description: Type of message like error,warning,help.

gridData.name: actionStatus
gridData.description: Fire when click on yes or no button

gridData.name: close
gridData.description: Fire when user close dialogue

gridData.name: onSuccess
gridData.description: Fire when click on yes button

gridData.name: onFailure
gridData.description: Fire when click on no button

gridData.name: color-palette
gridData.description: classic/ vibrant/ random/ specific (vibrant: amexio-theme-color6)

gridData.name: gradient
gridData.description: If true

gridData.name: Tab
gridData.description: Moves focus to next focusable element inside the dialog.

gridData.name: Shift+Tab
gridData.description: Moves focus to previous focusable element inside the dialog.

gridData.name: Escape
gridData.description: Closes the dialog.
